name: Goldfish Evolution Party
description:
A love story in the nature world which is never recorded in any wildlife documentary films...

Deep inside the ocean there is a little seeking-love goldfish, unyieldingly trying to meet his everlasting true love! In the sky to be two birds flying wing to wing, in the ocean to be two giant squids with arms intertwined!

- Mr Goldfish highly recommends this game!

- Retrieve your lost courage

- Mr Silverfish highly recommends this game too!

- Having pressure in life? Welcome to 20000 feet down in the ocean to experience the real pressure!

- Mr Copperfish highly recommends this game as well!

- Innocent love accompanied by beautiful music, wordless

- "You are not I; from where do you know whether I know the joy of fish?"
